channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lutnick warns no ‘fast deals’ for Japan and South Korea
item.description: U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick also said that Trump’s 10% baseline tariffs remained a “bottom line."

item.title: Can sunscreen give you cancer? What experts want you to know
item.description: Experts address concerns about sunblock ingredients.

item.title: Trump Officials Seek to Bring First White Afrikaner Refugees to U.S. Next Week

item.title: Europe’s Wind Industry Faces Uncertainty Over Trump’s Policies
item.description: Not long ago, the U.S. was seen as a promising market for offshore wind. Now industry executives aren’t making any assumptions.

item.title: Coinbase says $2.9 billion Deribit deal will increase profits even as income drops in Q1
item.description: CEO Brian Armstrong added that Deribit’s acquisition is his company’s “biggest move yet” to expand internationally.

item.title: Trump Administration Fires Librarian of Congress

item.title: What Trump Should Keep in Mind on His Big Middle East Trip
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is behaving in ways that threaten U.S. interests in the region.

item.title: ‘Justice for Cwecwe’: Report of a Child’s Rape Enrages South Africans
item.description: A mother’s call for justice has challenged a culture of shame and inspired a nationwide movement to tackle the crisis of sexual violence.

item.description: The election of the first American pope.

item.title: Overnight Clashes Strain Diplomacy Efforts for India and Pakistan
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio emphasized the need for “immediate de-escalation” as he spoke with leaders from both countries.

item.title: ‘You better go out and buy stock now,’ Trump said. Markets listened
item.description: "A trade agreement – even if it’s an agreement in principle – is what the markets were looking to see," one analyst said.
